name: IsPizzaHalfPrice
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: is pizza half price
des: Simply ask Alexa 'Is Pizza Half Price?' and she will check the previous day's sports scores for any qualifying promotions and tell you the code to use. Codes are valid at all participating Papa John's restaurants in the DC area.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
